text: This is a list of bridges and tunnels on the National Register of Historic Places in the U.S. state of Rhode Island. {| class="wikitable sortable" !|Name !|Image !|Built !|Listed !|Location !|County !|Type |- |Arkwright Bridge |100px |1888 |1978-12-12 |Cranston, West Warwick |Kent, Providence |Phoenix column;Pratt Truss |- |Boston and Providence Railroad Bridge |100px |1884 |1980-11-28 |East Providence |Providence | |- |Division Street Bridge |100px |1876 |1983-11-18 |Pawtucket |Providence |Stone Arch |- |Interlaken Mill Bridge |100px | |1978-12-22 |Coventry |Kent |Believed to be the only lenticular pony truss bridge in the state. |- |Main Street Bridge |Main Street Bridge |1858 |1983-11-18 |Pawtucket |Providence |Double Stone Arch |- |Mount Hope Bridge |100px |1927, 1929 |1976-01-31 |Bristol, Portsmouth |Bristol, Newport |Triple Span Steel Suspension |} ==References== Rhode Island Bridges Bridges
title: List of bridges on the National Register of Historic Places in Rhode Island
